name: Margaret Bond
review: This church that meets in Meaford Hall is a welcoming community with Bible-centred worship. After the 10:30 am service there is a short discussion time with Sunday school for the children followed by a potluck lunch.

name: marileekidd
review: Faithful preaching, all of God's Word applied to all of life.  Warm fellowship,  learning and growing together in Christ. Welcome to young and old alike.
